mapper.select: select bbs.num, bbs.title, bbs.date, mem.memName, com.comName from board bbs left outer join memberInfo mem on bbs.writer=mem.memNum left outer join companyInfo com on mem.comCode=com.comCode order by date desc, num limit 7

select bbs.num, bbs.title, bbs.date, mem.memName, com.comName from board bbs left outer join memberInfo mem on bbs.writer=mem.memNum left outer join companyInfo com on mem.comCode=com.comCode order by date desc, num desc limit #{firstRecordIndex}, 7
select count(*) from board bbs left outer join memberInfo mem on bbs.writer=mem.memNum where mem.id = #{id}

select bbs.num, bbs.title, bbs.date, bbs.content, mem.memName, com.comName from board bbs left outer join memberInfo mem on bbs.writer=mem.memNum left outer join companyInfo com on mem.comCode=com.comCode where bbs.num = #{selectNum}

select noti.num, noti.title, noti.content, noti.count, noti.date, adm.nickName from notice noti left outer join adminAccount adm on noti.adminNum=adm.adminNum order by noti.date desc limit #{firstRecordIndex}, 10
select noti.num, noti.title, noti.content, noti.count, noti.date, adm.nickName from notice noti left outer join adminAccount adm on noti.adminNum=adm.adminNum where showCheck = 1 limit 3
select noti.num, noti.title, noti.content, noti.count, noti.date, adm.nickName from notice noti left outer join adminAccount adm on noti.adminNum=adm.adminNum where noti.num = #{selectNum}
select roomNum from meetingRoom where branchCode = 1
select count(roomNum) as countREZ from reservation where roomNum = #{roomNum} and reservationDay = '${reservationDay}' and useStartTime = '${reservationDay} ${useStartTime}:00:00'

select REZ.roomNum, REZ.memNum, REZ.reservationDay, REZ.useStartTime, REZ.useFinishTime from reservation REZ left outer join meetingRoom room on REZ.roomNum = room.roomNum where room.branchCode = ${branchCode} and reservationDay = '${reservationDay}'
select roomNum, memNum, reservationDay, useStartTime, useFinishTime from reservation where memNum = #{memNum} and reservationDay >= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y-%m-%d')
select rent from meetingRoom where roomNum = #{roomNum}
mapper.delete: delete from reservation where roomNum = #{roomNum} and reservationDay = '${reservationDay}' and useStartTime = '${reservationDay} ${useStartTime}:00:00'
mapper.select: select id from memberInfo where memName=#{name} and memPhone=#{phone}
select signdate, comName, memName, id, dept, memPhone, memNickName, admission from memberInfo a right outer join companyInfo b on a.comCode=b.comCode where admission=0 order by signdate
select signdate, comName, memName, id, dept, memPhone, memNickName, admission from memberInfo a right outer join companyInfo b on a.comCode=b.comCode where admission=1 order by signdate

select myList.* from( select bbs.num, bbs.title, bbs.date from board bbs left outer join memberInfo mem on bbs.writer=mem.memNum where mem.id = #{id} order by date desc, num desc ) as myList limit #{pagination.firstRecordIndex}, 10
